website_summaries.verdict: Compact and portable steel cabinet offers plenty of capacity and flexibility, with a useful top tray in addition to drawer space.
pros: A nice midsize organizer at a competitive price
Full-length piano hinge is a plus, as is the locking top
Offers plenty of storage without being bulky
cons: Bearing drawer slides could be of better quality
Though steel, it’s not sturdy or strong enough for heavy-duty use

customer_reviews.title: Not ball bering drawer glides as stated.
customer_reviews.text: The Box is sturdy enough for the money but the drawers do not operate smoothly when empty and they feel like they are going to fall apart and the box is new. The latches are very light, not what could be considered heavy duty. Would be ok for light use but not for real tools. I was replacing one the same size that was worn out after about 5 years use it is no longer available. Ill not even waste my time transferring my tools over to this box. I would have gladly paid more for a box that was worth purchasing. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs, but poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool box to better organize my bicycle tools/parts etc, and it works great for that purpose. The drawers and the top part are large enough to hold several larger bike components. Bike parts are now organized in my closet. However, the toolbox is poorly constructed. The metal body is strong enough, but the metal clasps are so small they're almost a joke. The lock doesn't lock the box. The handle seems poorly attached. I wouldn't carry a fully loaded toolbox by that handle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that this tool box got such good ratings. Someone said it was built like a soda can, and he was right. The body of the box is very thin tin. The hinges are very flimsy and made of thin tin. The mechanism that holds the draws shut is loose and each draw is crooked. I paid 90 dollars and believe that is only worth maybe 45 dollars. I kept it but would not buy again or recommend it to anyone. I tried to take pictures to show what I'm talking about but It's lack of quality is hard to see in pictures because it's the gauge of the tin box and parts that's the problem.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee rich

customer_reviews.title: Top handle broke off after one month.
customer_reviews.text: Today 10/08/2019 the carry handle broke off while I was carrying the full 50lb box. I bought the box 09/06/2019, return window closed two days ago. Cheap Imported junk. I would not recommend this product to anyone who needs a reliable portable toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Only real benefit is that it's a 4 drawer I had a 3 drawer husky for around 2 years until two slides for the drawers came off. Husky Great value for the money!! This box is a thinner metal than husky feels a bit cheap handle broke off after two weeks with less weight than my 3 drawer the latches feel cheap as well and will probably break any day. I use this daily as a mobile mechanic. Definitely won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The handle came off with less than 7 months use. No excess weight. Used from shop to truck. Offered me $10 for broken handle...I passed. If a tool box can't handle tools...don't sell it. It is cheaply made and not worth buying. Spend a little more and but a better brand.....
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G Vidovich

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressive quality, but it is big...
customer_reviews.text: I needed something big and this is big enough to hold a large assortment of tools. But it's material quality and craftsmanship is pretty low. This one sits in my garage on the shelf all the time, and for that it is fine. BUT I would not want to carry this around with me in the back of my truck, It would clearly fall apart. I would have given 3 stars if it was less expensive, but for that price I expected a bit more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Back372

customer_reviews.title: Great, except handle isn't included in dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I like this box. I bought it because it fit into a small area that I need drawers for tools. My only gripe is that the dimensions don't include the handle. Lucky, I had enough space to slide it into the space I needed even with this issue. I'm sure most people will have have this issue, but since it caught me off guard and I almost needed to return it, I am deducting a star.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Looking to replace this tool box. Who wants this one?
customer_reviews.text: It seems like.it was cheaply made. Not like the last tool box i had. This tool box did not even come with drawer mats.
customer_reviews.author: Cheifbobo

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for 1.5 day's. Walking into a client's home. Handle breaks. Missed the CLIENTS car by MERE INCHES. $140 something. WTF! It's heavy which I'm ok with. The drawers fully open which I really like. The handle though well it sheared right off.
customer_reviews.author: jasen arndt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible drawer slides.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the tool box for not even 2 weeks and the top drawer slide is falling apart. When I opened the drawer today I noticed little bearings ( from the drawer slide) falling out all over.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great for price, you get what you pay for. If you are looking for a decent box, this is it. I got two and they fit perfect, side-by-side on a shelf in my service van. I keep rarely used tools in them.
customer_reviews.author: William Keating

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bearings for the drawers are just passable. I don't think this would stand up to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: This was study enough to hold all my bits & blades. It was a nice change from a plastic box I had to craddle in my arm to prevent breaking. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a box to hold misc tools. It’s not one for frequent use
customer_reviews.author: David Ornato

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong or sturdy as expected. Latches are easy to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good toolbox for the money. It is just as durable as a Craftsman which costs 3 times as much. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fir my fiance for Christmas. He loves the size and the 4 drawers. It is nice and sturdy. Big enough to carry all he needs and still small to move around with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Was not as sturdy as I expected, metal was thin and the handle broke the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Berryvilled

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought toolbox for work. Organize my tools easy to move from one location to another.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Toolbox arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Tool box arrived damaged major dents in side had to return. Drawers unable to open or close properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N. Gross

customer_reviews.title: It has a great amount of space
customer_reviews.text: I use the box for my tools on the job
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Sellers

product_meta.title: TANKSTORM Portable Steel Tool Chest with Drawers,20.6" 4-Drawer Box Storage Organizer Cabinet Metal Toolbox with Ball Bearing Slides, Black(X4)
feature_bullets: 4 drawers portable storage toolbox with a comfortable top handle and full-Length piano hinge
4 handy drawers hold a variety of tool,top tray for wider tools
Black powder coat paint for superior scratch and chemical resistance
Heavy duty ball bearing slides to make the drawers extra smooth when pulling in and out
